name: Little Super Star Kids Fashion
description:
WOAH! winters are here and its freezing cold that's why we have some awesome sweaters for little star!

Game features
Enjoy your own little wardrobe
try out from a variety of outfits
Huge collection of fashionable shirts, pants, frocks, skirts and sweaters
Worth trying hair styles in different colors
Make her look the most fashionable super star of the time!
Brrrr !! Winters are here thats why we have fluffy sweaters in the store too
unlimited outfit choices

We have got more dress up,beauty, makeup, and Princess Games for girls. We publish new dress up and makeover games for girls frequently. Just check ‘ More by Princess Girl Games, link in the game and enjoy.
